Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game.strategies

Interface Strategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteChair, ConcreteOR, ConcreteStair
public interface Strategy

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    compute(Structure structure, Card objCard)
    Offers the signature of the method each concrete strategy which implements Strategy has to override.

  • Method Details

    • compute

      int compute(Structure structure, Card objCard) throws IllegalCommandException
      Offers the signature of the method each concrete strategy which implements Strategy has to override. The goal is to pass to the entity delegated to compute the amount of points made by each player a structure containing only Strategy in order to make it agnostic regarding the type of concrete strategies it's dealing with
      Parameters:
      structure - the player structure
      objCard - the objective we want to look for on the player structure
      Returns:
      the number of points made thanks to objective satisfaction
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException
